text: Nagra Moapu vahekura nagu'areti hu'na tusi zavi ate'noe. Na'ankure vahe'mo'za mopazamia atre'za koro fre'za, Zoari ran kuma'ene Eglat-Silisia ran kumate vu'naze. Luhiti ran kuma'ma me'nea karanka mareneri'za zavira nete'za vu'naze. Horonaimi ran kuma'ma me'nea karankanema nevu'za, kuma'ma havizama hiazankura tusi zavi krafage hu'za vu'naze.
